My neighbour used to get S$4 an hr.  I wonder why they need to spend money to tell why it is good working there?  Are they desperate to get workers?  When I retired I did several contracts for a warehouse.  I paid a standard rate of S$7 an hour for my ad hoc workers.  I gave them 45 mins lunch with pay.  I had no requirements.  All they needed was to complete the assigment for the day.  One worker was 80 years old.  Many employers only nodded their heads when asked to employ seniors or if they do (for show) they pay peanuts.

12.post_text: Tuck into the brand new Black Pepper Flamer with a juicy, tender whole muscle chicken marinated with a feisty combination of black pepper, cumin and other spices, cooked to crispy perfection in black pepper batter. Topped with crisp lettuce and sandwiched between lightly toasted cornmeal dusted buns, the Black Pepper Flamer is a fiery combination to set your taste buds flaming. For a limited time only, pair the Black Pepper Flamer with the all-new zesty Citrus Thai Shaker Fries and cool down with the refreshing Lychee McFizz. For double the size and double the spice, the Double Black Pepper Flamer is also available!

20.post_text:
Miss playing on a see-saw with your BFF? Now you can relive those moments at Playsets of Yesteryears – an installation of play equipment popular in the '70s and ‘80s at Raffles Place Park. Organised by NParks - Let's Make Singapore Our Garden to commemorate 50 Years of Greening Singapore, the installation will rove to other parks and gardens after 19 May. Learn more about 50 Years of Greening Singapore at www.nparks.gov.sg/50years.

McDonald’s Singapore is proud to support 50 Years of Greening Singapore.

My name is BalaMurugan .I have been a full time and a part time crew at GekPoh shopping center for 4 years at MacDonald ,Jw75 Jurong West.
On the 7th of April 2013 which was on a Sunday, after finish my work for 6 hours, which was 9am to 3.30pm. I ask for my meal
to R.M JOYCE, and 2nd Assistant Manager Idah after 5 over times ,despite asking them they continued to act ignorant about 
my meal and keep pushing the irresponsibility to each other. "ask id ah ask Joyce". as i was angry and having a gastric pain i left
the place without having a meal after 6 hours.And today 10/4/2013 Wednesday , i confronted my R.M. Joyce over the phone and ask 
why i was treated like this. She told me my work was slow!!! I don't understand what does it got to with my work and my meal. and how can i do my work fast when i didn't have any meal in between my work and the whole day as i didn't have strength to work fast. But my co worker who came at work 11am get to eat their meal at 2pm. I am really disappointed with both managers who treat their crews in this manner. Even if my work was slow i still completed and ask my meal. And they still didn't give me .They are very unprofessional . Now i Want the Mom TO KNOW WHY
WE CANNOT WORK IN THIS SERVICE LINE BECAUSE SINGAPOREAN MISTREAT ANOTHER SINGAPOREAN.And I've already written a complaint email to the MacDonald HQ and they still haven't get back to me yet!!!!!!
Dear Beyond Bala Murugan, our Human Resource department will be contacting you asap on this matter. Thank you.
can you bring back the rockin hotcakes ad on TV ? :)
